Hi George, 

can you have a look at this.

Niko,

since from now on you are responsible person for the Info System, i am attaching this bug to you.
I don't get the error message, I only get the warnings. Do you still get the error message Mathias?

It should be fixed now. The two java.lang.NumberFormatExceptions that you were getting for longitute and latitude were because there is an entry of a site "Your Site Name" in ldap://iwrbdii.fzk.de:2170. Maybe you should remove it? I added some try catch code to handle with some unexpected values.

Nick.
